mapper.select: SELECT hp.problem_id, hp.card_id, COALESCE(hp.heritage_name, '알 수 없음') AS heritage_name, COALESCE(hp.image_url, '/static/images/cards/heritage/default.png') AS image_url, COALESCE(hp.description, '설명 없음') AS description, COALESCE(hp.content, '정보 없음') AS content, COALESCE(hp.object_image_url, '/static/images/cards/heritage_objects/default.png') AS object_image_url, hp.example1, hp.example2, hp.example3, hp.example4, hp.answer FROM heritage_problems hp INNER JOIN mission_positions mp ON hp.card_id = mp.card_id WHERE mp.mission_id = #{missionId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO heritage_books (user_id, card_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cardId}, NOW());
INSERT INTO logs (user_id, card_id, result, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cardId}, #{result}, NOW());
